metadata.title: CVE-2015-4017 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Salt before 2014.7.6 does not verify certificates when connecting via thealiyun, proxmox, and splunk modules.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4017` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

salt-api - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-cloud - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-common - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-master - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-minion - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-proxy - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-ssh - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-syndic - 2015.8.8+ds-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: salt package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2015.8.8+ds-1').
